system.description:
An elemental is a being composed of one of the four classical elements: air, earth, fire, or water.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to ¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); good saves depend on element (Fortitude for earth and water, Reflex for air and fire).

Traits: Elementals do not eat, sleep, or breathe; when slain, no soul is set loose—raise dead, reincarnate, and resurrection do not work (limited wish, wish, miracle, or true resurrection required); not subject to critical hits or flanking; immunity to poison, sleep, paralysis, and stunning; darkvision 60 ft.
